lines: Nta kizadutanya mur'iyo si nshya nziza,
Bazava mu bituro nka we rwose.
Abo yitoreye bazimana nawe mw ijuru,
N'ituro rya Yesu, Ryo mu twana twe.
Ubu nj'uko ndi nta kindi cyankiza.
Ni mara gukira nzabon'U mukiza wanjye,
Mwana wa Data we tyo se:
Kora no ku manyw'akaze! Ntucogore rwose!
Ugeze ko bwira rwose, Izuba rirenze,
Ducike ku by'iyi si, Turuhukane nawe.
Ducike ku by'iyi si, Uruhukire muri twe.
Umwami ngo jya hose, Ni Yesu ukiza.
Ukwize no mu nyanja, Ko Yesu akiza.
Mw irasaniro muti: Ni Yesu ukiza.
Ririmba ku bituro, Ko Yesu akiza.
Reb'inkovu zo ku mubiri we wose,
Twubake kuri we, Twubake kuri we;
Ye nta ko! ye nta ko!
Ye nta ryo! ye nta ryo!
Nta mwanya wasigiye Yesu ngo yinjiremo?
Nta mwanya wasigiye Yesu ngo yinjiremo?
Mbese nta mwany'ufite wo gukorera Yesu?
Mbese nta mwany'ufite wo gukorera Yesu?
Naho jyewe, ntacyo ndi cyo rwose;
Hafi yawe cyane, ni byo nifuza,
Yesu Mwami w'abami, Ngwin'ube muri jye!
Unsabe mu mutima, Ngengwe nawe rwose,
Ne kujya nivovota, Ngo mpore ku nkeke.
Yesu Mwami w'abami, Ngwin'ube muri jye!
Iyo njyanye na Yesu ntacyo ntinya.
Ngwe neza mu buryo bwose, Uyu munsi.
Murinzi we, w'i Sioni, Ijoro rigeze he?
Mbese tugeze ku cyambu, Tugiye kugerayo?
Mu nzira yo kunesha, Tuyoborwa na Yesu,
Kandi mujye mutwara, Intwaro zo kwizera.
Azaza ku bicu, Afit'ubwiza bwa Se,
Mbese, Ko tujya tuvuga, Iby'igihugu cy'ihirwe;
Ko tuvug'uko hameze, Kw'ari nta byaha n'urupfu,
Ngo nanjye njye niyumvamo, Uko kubayo byamera;
Niwe warumbwirije, Jye ntabwo nari nduzi.
Ngo wibere mu bwami bwo mw'ijuru?
Mpirwa ndi mu mababa Ye gusa.
Nta buhungiro nta bwugamo, Bw'umuzajoro nk'uyu.
Mbese ko tugiye gupfa, Nawe wiryamiye?
Bazegera ya ntebe ye ya cyami,
Ngo ngume mu Mukiza nkesha byose,
Haba hashashe izahabu, Nzogeza izina rye.
Iyo ugiz'ibicuguc'intege mu murimo wa Yesu.
Iyo mu rugendo rwawe mw'isi utakimeny'inzira.
Icyo nsaba gusa, Mfasha Mwami Yesu,
Yes'aje yasanga twiteguye, Yasanga turi maso?
Igihe cyose yagarukamo, Se twaba twiteguye?
Niba tuboneye mu mitima, Tuzagera mw'ijuru.
Mbese n'agaruka mu gicuku, Tuzaba turi maso?
Tuzibanira na Yesu, Muri cya gihugu cyiza,
Tunyura mu gicucu, No mu mugaru mwinshi,
Mutezeho byose, Mbe nk'umwana wiringira se.
Ntugire icyo utinya, Ndi kumwe nawe,
Ntutinye komera ndi kumwe nawe iteka.
Azakur'abantu be mu moko yose yo mw'isi,
Inteko nini y'abacunguwe na Yesu ubwe!
Inteko nini y'abacunguwe na Yesu ubwe!
Ubu mpagaz'imbere ya Yesu w'i Nazareti,
Ndi mu murima jyenyine, Ikime gitonze ku byatsi,
Aravuga maz'ijwi rye ryiza ryikirizwa n'inyoni,
Indirimbo nziza namwumvanye ntabw'izamva ku mutima.
Tugumana mu murima, Kuk'ubwire bwari bukubye,
Niba mbana na Yesu mur'iki gihe,
Namubonye no mu mazu y'abantu benshi cyane,
Mu gihe gito, Mu gihe gito,
Mu gihe gito, Mu gihe gito,
Wa si we, winshuka, Mpisemo Yesu!
Nzaba mu gituza cye, Mpisemo Yesu.
Va mu ntege nke zawe, Umwiyegurire.
Mbes'aho tuzahurira ku cyambu cya rwa ruzi,
Mbes'aho tuzahurira ku cyambu cya rwa ruzi?
Maze twumv'amajwi yabo tubareba mu maso?
Aje kujyan'intore ze mu bwami buhoraho?
Ndetse no mu gihe kibi cyane,
Nta bwoba mfite! Yesu ni muzima pe!
Nta bwoba mfite! Yesu ni muzima pe!
Akir'iri turo ngutuye, Niryo mutima wanjye,
Aje mu cyubahiro cye, Mucunguzi wacu.
Aje kujyana njye nawe, Mucunguzi wacu.
Ugoswe n'umukororombya ku ntebe ya cyami,
Mumusingize mu ndirimbo, No mu masengesho,
Yesu ni soko, Yesu niwe soko,
Numv'ibiremwa bisingiza izina rye mu ndirimbo,
Iby'Uhoraho yaremye byose, Ni byiza bitangaje.
Umuseke wa mu gitondo, N'impumuro y'uburabyo,
Nta kizaganz'imbaraga ze, Azahor'ari ku ngoma,
Isi n'iya Data, Ni kuki nababara?
Data niwe uri ku ngoma, Ijuru n'isi byishime.
Imana ni nyir'ibintu byose, Turi ibisonga byayo,
Zijye zikugaragaza Mwami, Ahantu hose tunyura,
Buri gihe tubane n'Imana, Dukoresh'igihe neza,
Nyereka za nkovu zo mu biganza,
Ku misozi hose no mu bikombe,
Kristo ashaka ko musanga, Se mukingurire?
Mb'amahor'iyo turi kumwe, Ngwino Mwami Yesu.
Ubuntu bwa Yesu bugwire hose, Mubamurikire,
Ubuntu bwa Yesu bugwire hose, Mubamu-rikire,
Nje kuba mu rukundo i wawe,
Munsi mwiza wejejwe, W'icyumweru cyo kurema,
Mpera ko nyiruhuka, Kukw'ari yo y'ukuri.
Amahoro masa, Aturuka ku Mana gusa,
Nta cyampangara ku manywa na nijoro,
Yesu niwe niringira, Niwe butunzi bwanjye,
Njye ndashaka kugendera mu mucyo wawe Yesu,
Ngo nzazuke nigira iwawe mw'ijuru heza.
Niho Yesu azanyakira ari mu ngoro ye.
Maze musabe kuba mu rukundo rwe,
Ndifuza ko bamenya ko har'umwanya wabo,

title: Reka Yesu Yinjire Mu Mutima Wawe

lines: Wa juru we ishime, Wa si we ririmba,
Nka bur'aho mfata nka ya numa yo mu nkuge,
Izo mw'isi yacu ni nk'indimi z'i Babeli,
Bazongera kubana na Yesu, Yee, Amina.
Mwami Yesu Mugenga w'ibi bintu byose,
Nimwihute mutabare abari mu byaha bose,
Ko turi mu bihe by'intege nke,
Uwiteka n'Umwungeri wanjye, Sinzakena na hato,
Asubiz'intege mu bugingo bwanjye mu gihe ntebye,
Naho nanyura no mu gikombe cy'igicucu cy'urupfu,
Sinzatiny'ikibi cyose Mwami kuko ndi kumwe nawe.
Untunganiriza ameza mu maso y'abanzi banjye,
Unsize amavuta mu mutwe maze aratonyanga.
Nanjye nzaba mu nzu y'Uwiteka ibihe bidashira.
Kugira ngo wemere kubabara no kumfira.
Mperako mererwa neza mu mutima wanjye.
Nta teka ncirwaho kuko ndi muri Yesu,
Twiringiye yuk'Umwami wacu, Ari hafi kugaruka.
Duhuriye muri Yesu Kristo, Duhujwe n'urukundo rwe,
Dufit'ibyiringiro mu Mana, Twibumbiye muri Kristo.
Yesu Mana yanjye nzi yukw'ari ryo zina rye,
Mwuka Wera We, We numa nziza,
Kandi nzaba mu nzu y'Uwiteka iteka,
Nyuza mu nzira ntoya ne guteshuka,
Mfasha mu ntege nke zanjye, Unsindire icyaha.
Ungarure hafi yawe, Ne kuyoba Mukiza,
Narazimiye, Mvana mu nzira y'urupfu Mwami.
Mfukamye imbere yawe, Ngushima Mwami wanjye,
Ndakwinginze Mwami mpa umugisha uyu munsi,
N'ubwo naba ngeze no mu kaga,
N'ubwo naba ngeze no mu kaga,
Mfasha ngo nyumvire, jye nta ntege,
Mbega ngo biranezeza, rikira, ra Yesu,
Imana iravuga iti: Ur'Umwana wanjye nkunda.
Nta rindi jwi nshaka kumva na gato;
Haba mu cyi cyangwa se mu muvumbi,
Mu nzira y'ubuzima bwab'ubane na bo;
Yes'abane na bo, Mu migendere yabo.
Baba mu mahoro, Haba se mu makuba;
Munsi mwiza w'umunezero! Ur'umunsi wera de!
Duhabw'imigisha myinshi cyane, Mur'uyu munsi mwiza;
Twumva rwose twakwigumira, Mur'uyu munsi wera!
Guhera mu bushorishori, No mu kuzimu mu nyanja;
Ati: Muz'abihanganye, Mu rugo rwa Data.
Shikama mu kuri kw'Imana nka Daniel.
Twung'ubumwe na Daniel, Tumere nka we.
Sinshaka kuza-bura mu bwami bwo mw'i-juru;
Mwami nje ngusanga, Nje bugufi bwawe.
Umpire Mwami, Wowe soko y'ubugingo bw'iteka;
Umpire Mwami; Wowe soko y'ubugingo bw'iteka.
Umpe gusa nawe, Mpa kamere yawe;
Ndashaka rwose kumera nkawe, Mpa kumera nkawe;
Ndashaka rwose kumera nkawe, Mpa kumera nkawe.
Ni wowe uduha kunesha ku rugamba,
Mu nzu ya Data ni heza cyane,
Ubu yicaye ku ntebe ye ya cyami,
N'Umwungeri mwiza wita ku ntama ze,
Ku ntebe y'ubwami kwa Data wo mw'ijuru,
Nukuri kwe kwera, Nukuri kwe kwera.
Yes'ari hafi kugaruka mu bwiza bwe;
Twimane na we mu bwami bwo mw'ijuru;
Ari hafi kugaruka mu bwiza bwe,
Mwa bari mw'isi mwe, ni mumuhimbaze,
Mu bishanga ndetse no mu bihu unyobore.
Ibi bihe ducamo biri hafi gushira,
Mw'ijuru kwa Yesu ni ho nzaba;

title: Iyo Ngenda Mba Ndi Kumwe N'Imana

lines: Iyo ngenda mba ndi kumwe n'Imana,
Ndi hafi yo kugera ku ntego,
Ko nkeneye Yesu Kristo, namubona nte?
Yabambwe ku bwawe, Nta wundi yaziraga;
Ngwino Mwami, Ngwino bwangu wimike ubwami bwawe.
Umunsi ku wundi turi mu rugendo;
Kwatura no guhamya mw'izina ry'Umwami Yesu;
Mw'izina rya Yesu muzanesha rwose. Amen
Nta wahwanya n'uwo Mwami gukomera rwose!
Impera z'isi, ikuzimu hamwe n'inyanja zose,
Biri mu biganza by'uwo Mwami ukomeye!
Tyo nimuze mu ngoro ye, Muririmbe mwese;
Muze mu marembo ye mwishimye, mumupfukamire.
Hirya hino hose mu mpande z'isi;
Ngw'aha nta cumbi mfite mur'iyi si!
Tyo twinjire mw'ishuri, Mu munsi wera,
Ndi hafi ye, na w'ampora bugufi;
Mu byaha ndetse no mu bujiji,
